_sText:
***aim_ag_texture2_modified_v3***

created by black_hawk

NEW VERSION AVAILABLE AT http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/113629

INSTALLATION :
put the .bsp file in C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\<steam accompt>\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

put the texture files, .vmt & .vtf, in C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\<steam accompt>\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials\black_hawk_maps
create the folders if it is necessary, you must create the "black_hawk_maps" folder.

*IMPORTANT* :
for the admins who want to instal my map on the servers, please don t forget this : when the client join your server, he have to download the two textures files, and have them in C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\<steam accompt>\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials\black_hawk_maps
create the folders if they don t exists.


Thank for your download, enjoy ^^
